| HistoryText             = The Marvel Knights moniker was used as a nickname for Daredevil's unnamed superhero team. The team initially formed to capture the [[Frank Castle (Earth-616)|Punisher]].{{r|Marvel Knights #4}}{{r|Marvel Knights #6}}

| Equipment               = 
| Transportation          = 
| Weapons                 = 

| Notes                   = * The name "Marvel Knights" is only used for identification purposes by readers. The team and all other characters in the Marvel Universe never referred to this team by that name or any other. This team has been referred to as "Daredevil's Unnamed Super-Hero Team" within the Marvel Universe itself.{{r|Secret War: From the Files of Nick Fury #1}} For the sake of this article the team will be referred to as the Marvel Knights.
